items.sentence: I think that it\'ll taste better if you add a little salt and pepper.
I don\'t know what\'s going on around here, but I intend to find out.
I couldn\'t find a job that would pay me enough to support my family.
It\'s very unlikely that Tom\'s children inherited anything from him.
Tom\'s new wife is younger than his daughter from his first marriage.
My father doesn\'t allow me to drive unless he\'s in the car with me.
I could\'ve gone to the seaside, but I went to the mountains instead.
I didn\'t want to cancel the appointment, but something else came up.
I don\'t care who your father is. You still have to follow my orders.
I don\'t have enough money on me right now to pay you what I owe you.
